select sab.*,sad.code,sad.name,ur.name as borrow_name,ur.tel from sys_article_borrow as sab,sys_article_detail as sad,sys_article as sa,user_resident as ur
sab.article_detail_id = sad.id and sad.article_id = sa.id and sab.create_id = ur.id
and sa.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and sab.borrow_status = #{status}
and ur.name like concat('%',#{borrowName},'%')
and ur.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and sab.begin_date > begin_date
and sab.end_date < end_date
